description: Quiero Arepas mobile food truck serves Venezuelan arepas, Venezuela's daily bread stuffed with fresh, local, Gluten Free ingredients.We are available to cater festivals, markets, bars/breweries, galleries, cafes, multiple truck gatherings, and private events.Igor and Beckie are the owners and operators of Quiero Arepas mobile kitchen. Igor was born in Maracaibo, Venezuela where his memories of enjoying arepas late night after music gigs finally encouraged him to learn to make them for himself. Our goal is to recreate the Venezuelan experience as he remembers it. Confident in our abilities and the beauty of simple, clean and natural ingredients...QUIERO AREPAS was born. Follow Arepita our truck as we make our way around Colorado serving up Venezuelan Arepas!  Keep an eye out for Arepita. You never know when she might be rolling your way.
name: Quiero Arepas
